entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR LATE THIS EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
CALM WINDS

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING EAST AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
CALM WINDS

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
